title: Authors and Citation
text: Jesse Smith. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Smith J (2022). dmhct: Data Model Package MLinHCT Project. https://github.com/jesse-smith/dmhct, https://jesse-smith.github.io/dmhct/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {dmhct: A Data Model Package for the MLinHCT Project},   author = {Jesse Smith},   year = {2022},   note = {https://github.com/jesse-smith/dmhct, https://jesse-smith.github.io/dmhct/}, }

what: A Data Model Package for the MLinHCT Project
title: A Data Model Package for the MLinHCT Project
text: dmhct extracts, loads, transforms data MLinHCT project. main functionality wrapped single function, dm_elt(), produces dm object ({dm} package) containing cleaned data tables SQL Server database.

title: A Data Model Package for the MLinHCT Project
text: can install dmhct Github : use package, need access SQL Server instance containing data. provided St. Jude ; contact Jesse Smith learn gain access.

title: A Data Model Package for the MLinHCT Project
text: main functionality package dm_elt(); function combines two sub-functions, dm_extract() dm_transform(), small pipeline. dm_extract() function wrapper pipeline used extract necessary data SQL Server load onto local machine. dm_transform() function provides second pipeline cleans table database outputs tables ready analysis (data.tables). functions cache results default compare checksum inputs cached checksum determine whether re-calculation necessary. allows functions simply read cached outputs, rather repeat costly computations, input unchanged. function also allows user force re-computation cache overwriting via reset argument. caching behavior (control arguments) made available dm_elt() wrapper well.
code: library(dmhct) dm <- dm_elt() #> Upgrading dm object created with dm <= 0.3.0. #> Upgrading dm object created with dm <= 0.3.0. dm2 <- dm_extract() %>% dm_transform() #> Upgrading dm object created with dm <= 0.3.0. #> Upgrading dm object created with dm <= 0.3.0. identical(dm, dm2) #> [1] TRUE

title: A Data Model Package for the MLinHCT Project
text: data used project consists 10 tables: entry point data master table, contains one row per patient includes baseline variables transplant date, patient demographics, donor characteristics. also contains unique IDs patients (entity_id) donors (donor_id). Data summary Variable type: character Variable type: Date Variable type: factor Variable type: logical Variable type: numeric tables keyed one columns (jointly) unique row. table contains entity_id primary key; tables except master define additional keys specific data contained table (example, many tables contain repeated observations patient thus add date key). ’s list data (non-key) columns table (excluding master):
code: summary(dm)[, -3L] #> Upgrading dm object created with dm <= 0.3.0. #> Upgrading dm object created with dm <= 0.3.0. #> Upgrading dm object created with dm <= 0.3.0. #> Upgrading dm object created with dm <= 0.3.0. #> Upgrading dm object created with dm <= 0.3.0. #> Upgrading dm object created with dm <= 0.3.0. #> Upgrading dm object created with dm <= 0.3.0. #> Upgrading dm object created with dm <= 0.3.0. #> Upgrading dm object created with dm <= 0.3.0. #> Upgrading dm object created with dm <= 0.3.0. #>                Length Class      #> hla            14     data.table #> master         26     data.table #> cerner          5     data.table #> chimerism       5     data.table #> death          10     data.table #> disease_status  4     data.table #> engraftment     5     data.table #> gvhd            5     data.table #> mrd             5     data.table #> relapse         4     data.table skimr::skim(dm$master, setdiff(colnames(dm$master), c("entity_id", "donor_id"))) #> Upgrading dm object created with dm <= 0.3.0. #> Upgrading dm object created with dm <= 0.3.0. #> Upgrading dm object created with dm <= 0.3.0. #> Upgrading dm object created with dm <= 0.3.0. dm::dm_get_all_pks(dm) %>% dplyr::mutate(pk_col = format(.data$pk_col)) #> Upgrading dm object created with dm <= 0.3.0. #> # A tibble: 10 × 2 #>    table          pk_col                       #>    <chr>          <chr>                        #>  1 hla            entity_id, donor_id          #>  2 master         entity_id                    #>  3 cerner         entity_id, test, date, n_obs #>  4 chimerism      entity_id, date, cat_source  #>  5 death          entity_id, n_id              #>  6 disease_status entity_id, date, n_status    #>  7 engraftment    entity_id, date              #>  8 gvhd           entity_id, date, cat_site    #>  9 mrd            entity_id, date              #> 10 relapse        entity_id, date tibble::tibble(   table = names(dm::dm_select_tbl(dm, -"master")),   cols = sapply(dm::dm_select_tbl(dm, -"master"), function(x) {     paste0(setdiff(colnames(x), data.table::key(x)), collapse = ", ")   }) ) #> Upgrading dm object created with dm <= 0.3.0. #> Upgrading dm object created with dm <= 0.3.0. #> Upgrading dm object created with dm <= 0.3.0. #> Upgrading dm object created with dm <= 0.3.0. #> Upgrading dm object created with dm <= 0.3.0. #> Upgrading dm object created with dm <= 0.3.0. #> # A tibble: 9 × 2 #>   table          cols                                                            #>   <chr>          <chr>                                                           #> 1 hla            n06, n08, n10, a, b, drb1, c, dqb1, dpb1, drb345, dqa1, dpa1    #> 2 cerner         result                                                          #> 3 chimerism      cat_method, pct_donor                                           #> 4 death          dt_death, dt_trans, lgl_on_therapy, cat_death_location, cat_de… #> 5 disease_status disease_status                                                  #> 6 engraftment    recovery_anc500, recovery_plat20k, recovery_plat50k             #> 7 gvhd           cat_grade, cat_type                                             #> 8 mrd            cat_method, pct_result, lgl_result                              #> 9 relapse        lgl_remission, dt_remission

title: A Data Model Package for the MLinHCT Project
text: can find code generating results table corresponding file named "dm_[table-name]". Changes committed directly main branch; going forward, changes made feature/bug fix/etc. branch reviewed another team member merging. Github repository set dis-allow pushing direct commits main.

title: A Data Model Package for the MLinHCT Project
text: dmhct created de-couple data cleaning code modeling code MLinHCT project. However, required dependency main modeling package, {predHCT}. possible install local development version use {predHCT}, recommended. Instead, please install main Github branch using installation instructions beginning document.

title: dm Cache Functions — DMCache
text: Functions reading, writing, checking/checksumming caches dm objects

title: dm Cache Functions — DMCache
text: DMCache$write() DMCache$read() DMCache$check() DMCache$checksum()

title: dm Cache Functions — DMCache
code: DMCache$write(   dm,   checksum,   file,   dir = path_create("~", ".cache_dmhct"),   n_threads = max(1L, parallel::detectCores()%/%2L) )

title: dm Cache Functions — DMCache
text: dm [dm] dm object checksum [chr(1)] hash dm object file [chr(1)] file stem use cache objects dir [chr(1)] directory save cache objects n_threads [int(1)] number threads use serializing dm object

title: dm Cache Functions — DMCache
text: [dm] dm object (invisibly) Read dm Data Checksum Specified Cache

title: dm Cache Functions — DMCache
code: DMCache$read(   obj = c("data", "checksum"),   file,   dir = path_create("~", ".cache_dmhct"),   fail = TRUE,   n_threads = if (obj == "data") max(1L, parallel::detectCores()%/%2L) else 1L )

title: dm Cache Functions — DMCache
text: obj [chr(1)] read cache file [chr(1)] file stem use cache objects dir [chr(1)] directory save cache objects fail [lgl(1)] Whether error dir/obj_file combo exist n_threads [int(1)] number threads use de-serializing object

text: [dm|chr(1)] de-serialized object Check Hash dm Object

text: checksum [chr(1)] hash dm object file [chr(1)] file stem use cache objects dir [chr(1)] directory save cache objects n_threads int(1) number threads use de-serializing cached checksum

title: dm Cache Functions — DMCache
text: [lgl(1)] Whether passed checksum cached checksum identical Hash dm Object dm_checksum() creates checksum hashing table + name individually, sorting name, hashing list results. means hash change ordering tables change dm, change data names added, deleted, modified.

title: Utility Functions for Chimerism Table ELT — UtilsChimerism
text: Transforms numeric vector using Gaussian quantile function qnorm(). Converts vector [0, 1] range using range prior transformation. Since qnorm(0) qnorm(1) infinite, values closer tol 0 1 truncated transformation.

text: [dbl] transformed vector Transform numeric Vector Using Inverse Probit Function

title: Utility Functions for Chimerism Table ELT — UtilsChimerism
text: Transforms numeric vector using Gaussian distribution function pnorm(). inverse probit(), also inverts truncation replacing transformed values closer tol 0 1 0 1 (respectively). Maps result domain specified range; values outside range truncated.
